archivebot-archive-summary: Summary message when the bot adds threads to the archive.
archivebot-archiveheader: {{doc-important|Only use your deletion template like {{talk archive}} which exist on your local project.}} NOTE TO TRANSLATOR: This should only be translated by someone on the Wikipedia of your language code. Thank you. Template that will be put on new archive pages as the header. NOTE: If this system message is not given for a language code, an archiving bot might not be supported on your site.
archivebot-older-than:
"duration" is the localized form of the elapsed time.
{{Identical|Older than}}
archivebot-page-summary: Summary message when the bot removes threads from a talk page for archiving.
